web_app: What is your website or app supposed to do? Describe its main purpose in simple terms.
Who will be using your website? Tell us about the people you want to reach.
What type of website is this? (like an online store, blog, portfolio, business site, etc.)
What pages do you want on your website? List the main sections people should see.
What can visitors do on your site? (read articles, buy things, contact you, etc.)
Do people need to create accounts and log in to use your site?
What information will you collect from visitors? (names, emails, addresses, etc.)
Should your website work well on phones and tablets?
What colors and style do you want? Describe how you want it to look and feel.
Do you want people to be able to search for things on your site?
Will you sell products or services? If yes, how will customers pay?
Do you need a contact form so people can send you messages?
What about a blog or news section where you can post updates?
Do you want social media buttons so people can share your content?
Will you have photos, videos, or other files for people to view or download?
Do you need a calendar to show events or appointments?
Should visitors be able to leave reviews or comments?
Do you want to send newsletters or email updates to your visitors?
Will you have different types of users? (like customers vs. employees)
Do you need a way to manage and update the content yourself?
Should the site work in multiple languages?
Do you want to track how many people visit and what they do?
Are there any special features unique to your business that you need?
Do you need the site to connect with other tools you already use?
What examples of other websites do you like? What appeals to you about them?
mobile_app: What will your mobile app do? Explain the main purpose in simple words.
Who do you want to use your app? Describe your ideal users.
Should your app work on iPhones, Android phones, or both?
What are the most important things people should be able to do in your app?
Do users need to create accounts and sign in to use your app?
Should your app work without internet, or does it need to be online?
What kind of information will your app save? (photos, notes, user profiles, etc.)
Do you want to send notifications to users' phones? What kind of messages?
Will your app use the phone's camera, location, or other built-in features?
How will you make money from your app? (sell it, show ads, charge monthly, etc.)
What screens or pages will your app have? List the main sections.
Should your app work on tablets too, or just phones?
What colors and style do you want? How should your app look and feel?
Do you want users to be able to share things from your app to social media?
Will people chat or message each other through your app?
Do you need a way to search for things inside your app?
Should your app work in different languages?
Do you want to track how people use your app to make it better?
Will your app need to connect with other apps or services you use?
Do you want users to be able to take photos or videos within your app?
Should people be able to use your app while offline and sync later?
Do you need different types of users with different permissions?
What makes your app special compared to similar apps?
Are there specific apps you like? What do you like about them?
Do you need any special security features to protect user information?
script: What task do you want your script to automate? Describe what it should do.
What files or information will the script work with?

Should the script backup files before making changes?
Do you want a simple version first, or does it need all features right away?
Are there any existing tools or programs the script should work with?
How much data will the script typically handle? (a few files vs. thousands)
Do you want to be able to change settings without editing the script itself?
Should the script keep a log of what it does each time it runs?
backend: What does your backend system need to do? Describe its main job.
What kind of data will your system store and manage?

Do users need to log in and have personal accounts?
What information will users be able to add, change, or view?
Does your system need to connect with other websites or services?

Do you need real-time features like instant messaging or live updates?
What should happen when something goes wrong with the system?

What reports or data summaries do you need the system to create?

Do you need different versions of your system running at the same time?
What other systems or tools does your backend need to work with?
How will you back up your data in case something goes wrong?
debug: What is broken? Describe what's not working in simple terms.
What error messages do you see? Copy the exact text if possible.
What were you trying to do when the problem happened?
When did this problem start? What changed recently?
What should happen vs. what actually happens?
Can you make the problem happen again? How?
What devices, browsers, or apps have this problem?
Does this happen to everyone or just some people?
Have you tried anything to fix it? What happened?
Is this slowing things down, completely broken, or something else?
How urgent is it to fix this? Is it blocking important work?
Is there a workaround people can use for now?
What specific actions or inputs cause the problem?
When does it happen? (certain times, high usage, specific users)
How big is the problem? (affects one page vs. entire system)
Did anything get updated or changed before this started?
What have you tried already to narrow down the issue?
Are any outside services or connections involved?
Have you seen any similar problems before?
Are there any simple things to check first? (typos, recent changes, etc.)
What would 'fixed' look like? How will you know it's resolved?
Who else is affected and needs to know about this problem?
How can you prevent this type of problem in the future?

Are there any compliance or regulatory requirements to check?
